structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Notwithstanding any other provision in this chapter, all rights of the utilities providing utility services in any area annexed by a city prior to the annexation, existing under other statutes, laws, or regulations are hereby expressly preserved.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 303, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1980.
